title: Cannot launch Alpha Client
body:
Just downloaded the client and it will not launch. I have checked to ensure it is in the correct file specified, however it will not launch. It once showed a little window and then closed almost immediately before I could read what it says and it doesn't appear as running in task manager.I have also tried to uninstall it however the uninstall also doesn't load so I have tried deleting the files and also just reinstalling again but no success

**SOLUTION FOUND (located in give link)** 
found this and followed it and it seemed to work perfectly for me! If you're a fellow MSI user having trouble with the alpha client [this](http://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion-en/pqlTBA3G-alpha-client-startup-issues) may be a potential solution. Good luck!

replies.body: Yeh dude i had the same problem so I decided to play a bit of CS:GO. my net was really bad during that game so i decided to restart my computer, and after the game i launched the alpha client and it worked
thanks for the help, i tried restarting and it worked enough to open it to the updating window but now has crashed again... fingers crossed it decides to work next time i restart lol
